name: CalVet Benefits & Services Portal
description: Free benefits screening and navigation for California veterans and families; access to CalVet home loans, college fee waivers, veterans homes, employment services
fullDescription: The California Department of Veterans Affairs (CalVet) connects California's 1.6 million veterans and their families to state and federal benefits. The CalVet portal helps veterans discover and apply for housing, education, employment, healthcare, and financial assistance.
whatTheyOffer:
- Personalized benefits eligibility screening
- Home loans with competitive rates (CalVet Home Loans)
- College fee waivers for dependents (CalVet College Fee Waiver)
- Veterans Homes of California (8 locations statewide)
- Employment and career services
- Claims assistance for VA benefits
- Mental health and wellness resources
- Veteran ID cards
howToGetIt:
1. Visit calvet.ca.gov or call the CalVet helpline
2. Complete the free benefits eligibility screening
3. Get personalized recommendations for available programs
4. Work with a CalVet representative to apply for benefits
5. Visit a County Veterans Service Office (CVSO) for in-person help
keywords: CalVet, veteran benefits, California veteran, VA benefits, home loan, college fee waiver, veterans home, employment, claims assistance
